name: Lloyd's Golden Ultra Dragon
description: Dragon and ninja playset: Kids can relive adventures from the NINJAGO: Crystallized TV series with this LEGO NINJAGO Lloyd's Golden Ultra Dragon.

name: Star Wars Darth Vader Helmet
description: The iconic design of Darth Vader's Helmet is recreated in LEGO bricks to spark memories of classic Star Wars saga scenes, and the display stand with nameplate completes an impressive centerpiece.

name: Hogwarts Carriage
description: Iconic characters - Includes Harry Potter and Luna Lovegood minifigures, an adult and baby Thestral, plus a buildable carriage that attaches to the adult Thestral.

name: Friends Olivia's Space Academy
description: Spaceship toy with authentic details - Showcasing features from the Space Shuttle program, this set includes a Space Shuttle model, an academy building, telescope and 4 LEGO Friends characters.

name: Mandalorian Helmet
description: Add to your collection - The Mandalorian Helmet is part of a range of collectible LEGO Star Wars build-to-display helmet models, each designed to offer an immersive and rewarding creative challenge. Treat yourself or give this 584-piece set as a birthday present, holiday gift or special surprise to a Star Wars: The Mandalorian fan or LEGO Star Wars collector.

name: Friends Central Perk Building
description: Here's a LEGO brick-built version of the famous CENTRAL PERK café packed with authentic details to inspire hilarious memories of the classic Friends TV show and to show off to your own friends.

name: Heartlake City Pizzeria
description: Gift for pizza lovers – Includes LEGO Friends Olivia and Ethan, a separate outdoor seating area, pretend pizza oven, pizza paddle, skateboard and food toys such as cheese, a grater and a sauce bottles. A gift to get the creative juices flowing – Designed for kids aged 5 and up, this buildable playset brings restaurant fun to kids' bedrooms.

name: Marvel Venom
description: Classic Marvel character - Kids assemble the 297-piece figure into a realistic recreation of Venom, the alien enemy of Spider-Man. All parts of the buildable Venom are articulated, so kids can move, position and pose the figure just like the real thing.

name: Friends Water Park
description: Includes 3 characters - Comes with 2 mini-dolls, including LEGO Friends Olivia and a micro-doll, and buildable toy activities based on a real-world water park.
